text: Gumapang Ka sa Lusak is a 1990 Filipino drama film directed by Lino Brocka. ==Plot== A teenage boy befriends B-movie actress Rachelle who is having an affair with Mayor. His wife Rowena wants to get rid of her in order to not snag controversy during the election. Rachelle agreed to disappear only in two conditions: if Edmundo releases her lover out of prison; and kill his rival opponent in the elections. Lino Brocka's Gumapang Ka sa Lusak shows the evils of society, corruption and epidenious world of glitz, and disaster in the world of the ruling influential, society of politics and the message of life trying to make a living from the dirt and gravel of society we all struggle to live in. ==Cast== *Dina Bonnevie as Rachel Suarez *Christopher De Leon as Levi *Eddie Garcia as Edmundo Guatlo *Charo Santos as Rowena Guatlo *Bembol Roco as Falcon *Allan Paule as Jonathan *Francis Magalona as RJ *William Lorenzo as Eric *Timothy Diwa as Dodo *Perla Bautista *Anita Linda *Maureen Mauricio *Ernie Zarate *Lucita Soriano *Ray Ventura *Archie Adamos ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Philippine films Category:Tagalog-language films Category:1990s thriller drama films Category:Filipino-language films Category:1990 drama films
title: Gumapang Ka sa Lusak
